availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, attorney. Jefferson County, Kentucky, native. Married to Alice A. Davies Mix. Father of Elizabeth Mix, Davies Mix, William Mix, and Loraine Mix. Farmer in Jefferson County in 1850. Graduated from Wabash College in Crawfordsville, Indiana, in 1854. Graduated University of Louisville Law School in 1855. Practiced in partnership with Alexander Booth. Jefferson County Attorney in 1862 and 1863. Director of Mutual Life Insurance Company.

ab.bibl: "Will Be Private: Funeral of the Late William Mix," Courier-Journal (Louisville, Ky.), November 1, 1894, p. 8; "Gathered to His Fathers: Death of William Mix," Courier-Journal (Louisville, Ky.),October 31, 1894, p. 2.
